Html:
It would be cool when you compile, it asks if you want to compile it as an asm prgm or as a app prgm.

Not sure if it's hard to do, but it would be awesome !

I assume youre talking about for wabbitcode? If you've created a project, then simply change the file extension to .8xk for an app or .8xp for a program. If you're not using a project, then in options there is an option to set the output file
